    • Constructor Detail

      • Molecule

        public Molecule(int id,
                java.lang.String name,
                double weigth,
                double radius,
                java.lang.String color,
                double dRL0,
                double dRL1,
                double dRL2,
                double dRL3,
                double dRL4,
                double dRL5,
                double dRL6,
                double dRL7,
                int maxLayer,
                int minLayer,
                ec.util.MersenneTwisterFast random)
        Instantiates a new molecule.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique id
        name - the molecule name
        weigth - the molecule weight,
        radius - the molecule radius
        color - the color
        dRL0 - the molecule diffusion rate in the cell exterior
        dRL1 - the molecule diffusion rate in the cell layer
        dRL2 - the molecule diffusion rate in the cell layer
        dRL3 - the molecule diffusion rate in the cell layer
        dRL4 - the molecule diffusion rate in the cell layer
        dRL5 - the molecule diffusion rate in the cell layer
        dRL6 - the molecule diffusion rate in the cell layer
        dRL7 - the molecule diffusion rate in the cell layer
        maxLayer - layer which can be accessed by passive diffusion
        minLayer - layer which can be accessed by passive diffusion
        random - the random MersenneTwisterFast generator

      • prepare

        public void prepare(sim.engine.SimState state,
                    java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.Double,Molecule> mapX,
                    boolean isProblematic)
        Preparing the molecule for the next move, collisions with the environment is detected, check if the speed should be modified, etc.
        Parameters:
        state - the state
        mapX - the molecules map ordered by the X coordinate
        isProblematic - flag indicating if the molecule is problematic, by example if the desired location is between two thread submaps
